pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lite Wrapper for the 'Zamzar File Conversion' API // A minor collection of HTTP wrappers for the 'Zamzar File Conversion' API. The wrappers makes it easy to utilize the API and thus convert between more than 100 different file formats (ranging from audio files, images, movie formats, etc., etc.) through an R session. For specifics regarding the API, please see https://developers.zamzar.com/.
